user.title: Log in to Jebao
user.description: Please enter your Jebao credentials and select your country.

device_setup.title: Device Setup
device_setup.description: Configure IP addresses for {number_of_devices} devices. Leave empty for cloud-only mode.

error.auth: Failed to authenticate. Check your credentials.
error.no_devices: No devices found. Make sure your devices are registered in the Jebao App first.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Check the LAN IP address.
error.discovery_failed: Automatic discovery failed. Please enter the LAN IP address manually.

reconfigure.title: Update Credentials
reconfigure.description: Update your Jebao credentials and rediscover devices.
